message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me and has the potential to significantly benefit you. After careful consideration, I am extending this offer to you at a price of $1200000. This amount reflects the intrinsic value of the product while also providing you with a substantial return on investment given its worth to you at $1500000. I believe this offer strikes a fair balance and presents an excellent opportunity for both parties. I look forward to your positive response.
